data.question: What is the formula of the synthesized heterometallic microporous coordination polymer?
What method was used for the crystal structure determination of the synthesized polymer?
What is the thermal stability range of the synthesized polymer before any significant weight loss occurs?
Does the synthesized polymer show Type I adsorption isotherms for CO2?
Is the Lewis acidity of the synthesized polymer's framework stronger than that of HX zeolite?
What is the characteristic adsorption energy (βE0) of acetone on the synthesized polymer?
What is the role of Na(I) ions in the synthesized polymer?
data.answer: They operate as an electron-withdrawing site for the O atom of acetone.

data.question: Can the synthesized polymer adsorb benzene at 298 K?
What is the void volume percentage of the synthesized polymer without water guests?
Is the synthesized polymer's structure described as a 3D pillared-layer-type porous structure?
What is the cross-section dimension of the 1D channels in the synthesized polymer?
Does the synthesized polymer possess straight 1D channels along the b axis?
What is the interatomic distance between adjacent Na(I) ions along the b axis in the synthesized polymer?
What happens to the synthesized polymer upon exposure to open air for a few minutes?
Is the synthesized polymer's ability to adsorb acetone indicative of its Lewis acidic pores?
What is the density of Na(I) in the porous structure of the synthesized polymer?
Does the synthesized polymer show anisotropic confinement of basic guests around Na(I) sites?
What is the role of dabco in the synthesized polymer?
data.answer: Dabco ligands connect each of the layers to build a rigid 3D pillared-layer-type porous structure.

data.question: What is the formula weight of the synthesized polymer?
Does the synthesized polymer's structure allow for the immobilization of sodium cations on the pore surface?
